title: Castrol Syntron X
description_ru: Одно из первых масел для автомобилей уровня supercar (премиальные и спортивные автомобили), первая синтетика Castrol;
description_en: One of the earliest engine oils developed specifically for supercar-grade engines. Syntron X represents Castrol’s first true synthetic formulation, created for engines with unusually high specific output and thermal stress.

title: Shell TMO part 1
description_ru: Минеральное, а затем и синтетическое масло для автомобилей уровня supercar от Shell;
description_en: Shell TMO originated as a premium mineral oil for elite performance cars and later evolved into synthetic formulations, reflecting Shell’s early recognition of the lubrication demands of high-performance engines.

title: Shell TMO part 2
description_en: Continuation of the Shell TMO lineage, focusing on formulation evolution, field experience, and the gradual transition from mineral excellence to synthetic thinking in high-performance lubrication.

title: Phillips 66 Trop-Artic
description_ru: Уникальное название Trop-Artic компании Manhattan Oil было выкуплено компанией Phillips для отдельного эпохального масла, которое продержалось на рыке более 50 лет;
description_en: Trop-Artic became one of the most enduring oil brands in PCMO history. Acquired from Manhattan Oil, Phillips turned it into an all-climate flagship that survived technological and market shifts for over half a century.

title: BP Energol
description_en: Energol holds historical significance as the first documented 10W-40 engine oil, marking the moment when viscosity engineering became an intentional design choice rather than an empirical compromise.

title: Esso Uniflo (intro)
description_en: Uniflo was an unofficial multigrade oil in the 1930s, challenging the seasonal oil paradigm decades before multigrade classifications were formally standardized.

title: Esso Uniflo part 1
description_en: Often regarded as the first true multigrade engine oil in history, Uniflo demonstrated that controlled viscosity behavior across temperatures was chemically achievable long before polymer VI improvers became mainstream.

title: Esso Uniflo part 2
description_en: This Uniflo formulation is historically recognized as the first 5W-20 engine oil, anticipating modern low-viscosity efficiency trends by several decades.

title: Union76 Royal Triton
description_ru: Масло фиолетового цвета - уникальное премиальное минеральное моторное масло 1950-х - 1960-х;
description_en: A premium mineral oil of the 1950s–1960s, famous for its distinctive purple color and for representing the absolute peak of pre-synthetic mineral oil formulation.

title: Castrol Syntec FSX
description_ru: То самое масло из-за "синтетики" которого поспорили Mobil и Castrol. Содержало уникальные эстеры, но перешло полностью на HC;
description_en: Syntec FSX became central to the Mobil vs. Castrol dispute over the definition of synthetic oil. Initially ester-rich, it later transitioned to hydrocracked bases, setting a legal and technical precedent for the industry.

title: Pennzoil Mult-vis
description_ru: Одно из самых продаваемых масел PCMO за всю историю.
description_en: One of the best-selling PCMOs of all time. Mult-vis also became legally notable after advertising litigation clarified that polymer mechanical strength alone does not define superior engine protection.

title: SOHIO QVO
description_en: The first engine oil formulated as 5W-40, QVO expanded the multigrade concept into a viscosity range that would later become a European performance standard.

title: Amoco LDO
description_ru: Одно из первых LL-масел - 6000 миль для самого начала 1960-х;
description_en: One of the earliest long-drain oils, rated for 6,000 miles at a time when such intervals were considered radical.

title: Mobil SHC
description_en: The first commercially significant PAO-based engine oil, marking the true beginning of modern synthetic lubrication.
